title: Thank you!! @Mastermirkinen
body:
We played an Aram and I got matched up against you, we had fun and talked about LA and how bad macs were, but i didn't expect the mystery gift at the end!!! If any Rioters or Mirk himself sees, please let him know, thank you so much mirk :O

p.s. good luck with the trip back :D

replies.body: My pleasure man, I had fun and you were entertaining and a pleasure to play with so well deserved if you ask me :)

I think there needs to be someone standing up for poor Macs and their users:

Introducing: Na na na na na na na na na **Mac-man!**

"Defending the streets of Runeterra from computer-racial slurs and Windows elitism!
Just shine a big apple symbol in the sky and he will be there _(Assuming he isn't lost trying to figure out how the fuck the new iTunes works...)_"

But anyway, congrats on the gift man, i wasn't aware anyone actually used that feature.
Good on you MasterMirkinen

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eRsQN1ah,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-13T01:24:58.231+0000)
>
> I think there needs to be someone standing up for poor Macs and their users:
> 
> Introducing: Na na na na na na na na na **Mac-man!**
> 
> "Defending the streets of Runeterra from computer-racial slurs and Windows elitism!
> Just shine a big apple symbol in the sky and he will be there _(Assuming he isn't lost trying to figure out how the fuck the new iTunes works...)_"
> 
> But anyway, congrats on the gift man, i wasn't aware anyone actually used that feature.
> Good on you MasterMirkinen

Don't look at me...
I play on a mac when I travel and I hate it almost as much as I hate Rengar.

Ahhhh thats nothing! come back when you hate it as much as Yasuo! :P

Then Mac-man will battle him to defend all mac's _(and lose of course because its Yasuo) _

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eRsQN1ah,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-09-13T20:23:59.522+0000)
>
> Ahhhh thats nothing! come back when you hate it as much as Yasuo! :P
> 
> Then Mac-man will battle him to defend all mac's _(and lose of course because its Yasuo) _

you make it sound like 90% of these yasuo aren't absolute trash

Wether Yasuo players are trash or wether they are powerful doesn't matter, a vast majority of players still have a problem with him for various reasons. 
No one can deny that. 

Even if something is a very good thing, if 90% of the people don't like it... thats an indication that it needs to be changed.

And as a side note, Yasuo has a very high win rate, so obviously theres not as many 'trash' Yasuo's as you make out there is.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eRsQN1ah,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-14T06:16:12.307+0000)
>
> Wether Yasuo players are trash or wether they are powerful doesn't matter, a vast majority of players still have a problem with him for various reasons. 
> No one can deny that. 
> 
> Even if something is a very good thing, if 90% of the people don't like it... thats an indication that it needs to be changed.
> 
> And as a side note, Yasuo has a very high win rate, so obviously theres not as many 'trash' Yasuo's as you make out there is.

or. Maybe there are, but some people decided to play the actual broke champions and solo carry the teams with the trash yasuo. Win rate literally means nothing.

So people are only carrying the Yasuos and not the Master Yi's or the Zeds or other powerful champs?

Just Yasuos?

makes sense aye.

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eRsQN1ah,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-09-13T17:33:28.218+0000)
>
> Don't look at me...
> I play on a mac when I travel and I hate it almost as much as I hate Rengar.

Hahaha nice :^)

Thank you.

At least someone appreciates us mac folk
